kariminf.langpi.basic

Interface Segmenter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArSegmenter, BgSegmenter, CaSegmenter, CJSegmenter, CsSegmenter, DefSegmenter, DeSegmenter, ElSegmenter, EnSegmenter, EsSegmenter, EuSegmenter, FaSegmenter, FiSegmenter, FrSegmenter, HeSegmenter, HiSegmenter, HuSegmenter, IdSegmenter, ItSegmenter, JaSegmenter, KoSegmenter, LatinSegmenter, NlSegmenter, NnSegmenter, NoSegmenter, OpennlpSegmenter, PtSegmenter, RoSegmenter, RuSegmenter, SvSegmenter, ThSegmenter, TrSegmenter, ZhSegmenter

    public interface Segmenter
    Sentence segmentation and word tokenization for a given language.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> segmentWords(java.lang.String text)
      Tokenizes a text: split it to many words.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> splitToSentences(java.lang.String text)
      Segments a text in a given language to many sentences.

    • Method Detail

        Segments a text in a given language to many sentences.

        Returns:
        a list of sentences

      • segmentWords

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> segmentWords(java.lang.String text)
        Tokenizes a text: split it to many words.
        Parameters:
        text - input text (a sentence usually)
        Returns:
        a list of words
